sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export function Contract({ tokenData }) { return (

Contract Info

Token: {tokenData.name}

Symbol: {tokenData.symbol}

Address: {tokenData.address}

TotalSupply: $ {(Math.round(tokenData.total * tokenData.decimals**10) / (tokenData.decimals**10)).toFixed(tokenData.decimals).toString()}

); }
